src:
¡Éstos son los videojuegos que se lanzan en noviembre!
02 Nov 2019, 14:00 by Staff Atomix



Seguimos con la temporada intensa de lanzamientos de este 2019. Después de que octubre tuviera un cierre de alarido, es momento de que noviembre llegue con las armas más grandes que le quedan al medio para este año. La cosa se va a poner verdaderamente buena y la verdad, no tenemos ni idea de donde vamos a sacar el tiempo que se quiere para poder jugar todo lo bueno. A continuación te contamos de todos los juegos que se lanzan en las siguientes cuatro semanas.
1
Spirit of the North (PS4)
5
Just Dance 2020 (Wii, Switch, PC, Xbox One, PS4)
Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Games Tokyo 2020 (Switch)
Planet Zoo (PC)
Red Dead Redemption 2 (PC)
Valfaris (PS4)
8
Death Stranding (PS4)
Disney Tsum Tsum Festival (Switch)
Golem (PS4)
Layton’s Mystery Journey: Katrielle and the Millionaire’s Conspiracy – Deluxe Edition (Switch)
Need for Speed Heat (PS4, Xbox One, PC)
New Super Lucky’s Tale (Switch)
Valfaris (Xbox One)
11
Romancing SaGa 3 (Switch, PS4, PS Vita, Xbox One, PC)
13
Last Labyrinth (PS4, PC)
14
Age of Empires II: Definitive Edition (PC)
15
Pokémon Sword & Shield (Switch)
Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order (Ps4, Xbox One, PC)
Tokyo Ghoul: re Call to Exist (PC, PS4)
19
Shenmue III (PS4, PC)
22
Sniper: Ghost Warrior Contracts (PS4, Xbox One, PC)

text:
These are the video games that are released in November!
02 Nov 2019, 14:00 by Staff Atomix



We continue with the intense launching season of this 2019. After October had a scream closure, it is time for November to arrive with the largest weapons left in the middle for this year. The thing is going to get really good and the truth, we have no idea where we are going to take the time we want to be able to play everything good. Here we tell you about all the games that are released in the next four weeks.
one
Spirit of the North (PS4)
5
Just Dance 2020 (Wii, Switch, PC, Xbox One, PS4)
Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Games Tokyo 2020 (Switch)
Planet Zoo (PC)
Red Dead Redemption 2 (PC)
Valfaris (PS4)
8

Disney Tsum Tsum Festival (Switch)
